cards.title: Victory
powers: {Victory} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
One player may draw 2 cards. If they do, they discard a card.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.default: Stand down before anyone gets hurt. This is your one warning.
openingLines.TheDreamerCharacter: We're gonna get you out of there, okay? Just hang on.

cards.title: Atomic Piledriver
body: You may play an Ongoing card.
{Victory} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Discard the top card of your deck.

cards.title: Battle Joy
body: Whenever {Victory} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, discard the top card of your deck.
At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more cards in your trash, draw a card.

cards.title: Faster than a Jet
body: At the end of your turn, you may play a card or use a power. If you do, {Victory} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
Once per turn, when {Victory} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, she may deal that target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: First into the Fray
body: At the end of your power phase, if {Victory} dealt no damage this turn, {Victory} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
powers: {Victory} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. Discard the top card of your deck.

cards.title: Go Through
body: {Victory} deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
{Victory} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.
Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

cards.title: Grab and Twist
body: {Victory} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Until the start of your turn, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1.
Discard the top card of your deck.

cards.title: Harder than Diamond
body: Reduce non-lightning damage dealt to {Victory} by 1.

Whenever a target is reduced from 1 or more to 0 or fewer HP or a non-target environment card is destroyed, {Victory} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.

cards.title: It's Nice Having a Friend
body: At the start of your turn, you may destroy one of your Ongoing cards. If you do, draw 2 cards.
powers: Discard 2 cards. If you discarded 2 cards this way, {Victory} and another hero target each regain 2 HP.

cards.title: Mightier than a Battleship
body: Increase damage dealt by {Victory} to other targets by 1.

At the end of your turn, {Victory} deals 1 villain target 0 psychic damage. Then, if {Victory} has dealt no damage to other hero targets this turn, she deals 1 other hero character target 0 psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.

cards.title: Open Up to Someone
body: At the end of your turn, discard up to 2 cards. If you discard 2 cards this way, {Victory} regains 1 HP.
powers: Draw a card. Discard up to 3 cards. X heroes each draw a card, where X = the number of cards discarded this way.

cards.title: Orbital Guidance
body: Search your deck and/or trash for up to 2 Mantle cards and put them into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
You may play a Mantle card.
{Victory} may deal 1 target 2 irreducible melee damage. If she dealt no damage this way, return this card to your hand.

cards.title: Repair the Lattice
body: {Victory} deals herself 4 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom 3 cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
One hero target regains 5 HP.
If {Victory} was dealt 2 or more psychic damage this turn, she may regain 2 HP or use a power.

cards.title: See the Underpinnings
body: Reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Shuffle 2 of them back into that deck. Put the remaining card on the top or bottom of that deck.

cards.title: Show Vulnerability
body: You may put any number of your Mantle cards from play into your hand.
Search your deck or trash for an Ongoing card and put it into play or into your hand.
Shuffle your trash into your deck.

cards.title: Woven into Reality
body: At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.
powers: Destroy an Ongoing or non-target environment card. {Victory} deals herself 3 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom 2 cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck.

cards.title: Yank the Threads
body: {Victory} deals 1 target 7 irreducible projectile damage.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck. If you moved 2 or fewer cards to your deck this way, {Victory} deals herself 3 irreducible toxic damage.
Discard the top card of your deck.

promoCards.title: Cerulean
powers: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
Play an Ongoing card from your trash. [i]Cerulean[/i] deals herself 4 irreducible psychic damage unless you shuffle the bottom 3 cards of your trash into your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.

openingLines.default: Hey, uh... You need to stop. Right, guys?
